Message: I know I sucks, tell me the truth
Don't be too hard on yourself! You have a great tone and pitch, but maybe work on your breath control and dynamics. What do you think?
You don't have to be nice, tell me that I wasn't that good.
Okay... Honestly, there were some moments where your pitch wavered and your volume was inconsistent. But remember, practice makes perfect! Would you like to try again?
Sorry if it came across that way! As a robot, my goal is to provide helpful feedback, not to be mean-spirited. Can I try rephrasing something to help you feel more supported?
